column4: Hi you guys, im getting syn flooded when i seed at full speed during bittorent downloads, any ideas what may cause this ?
I get tons of messages like this: TCP: Possible SYN flooding on port 8500. Sending cookies. and then the network crashes
too many connections for your router
would a new router adress this issue?
its quite normal on consumer Aps
try to keep the number of connections under a limit
is it my broadband modem or my wifi router connected to the modem?
this udp stateless stuff can kill a lot
i think it is the wifi router
more than 300 connections and mine tilts
thanks, ill check it by bringing my pc to my friends house, he doesnt have issues like this
running Windows this doesnt happen.. any ideas?
